languages.text: "Эддок Френзо, я спрошу лишь раз: откуда у бедняков с нижних палуб ящик с пулеметами?"
languages.translation_comment: Если у игрока был бой с ячейкой бунтовщиков в трущобах

languages.text: "Я спрошу лишь раз: откуда у бедняков с нижних палуб ящик с авторужьями?"
languages.translation_comment: Если у игрока был бой с ячейкой бунтовщиков в трущобах

languages.text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"
languages.original_text: "Я спрошу лишь раз: откуда у бедняков с нижних палуб ящик с авторужьями?"

traits.locale_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did paupers from the lower decks get their hands on a crateful of machine guns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did paupers from the lower decks get their hands on a crateful of machine guns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of machine guns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of machine guns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"
"I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

languages.text: «Solo voy a preguntarlo una vez. ¿Cómo han conseguido las ratas de las cubiertas inferiores una caja de rifles automáticos?».
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo voy a preguntarlo una vez. ¿Cómo han conseguido las ratas de las cubiertas inferiores una caja de ametralladoras?».

languages.text: 「一度しか聞かない。下層デッキから来た連中は、どうやってオートガンの箱を手に入れた？」
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

traits.locale_text: 「一度しか聞かない。下層デッキから来た弱者どもは、どうやってスタッバーの木箱を手に入れた？」

languages.text: “这个问题我只问一次：底层甲板的那群渣滓是怎么弄到一整箱自动枪的？”
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

traits.locale_text: “这个问题我只问一次：底层甲板的那群渣滓是怎么弄到一整箱伐木枪的？”

languages.text: "Ich werde das nur einmal fragen: Wie konnte Abschaum von den unteren Decks an eine Kiste mit Sturmgewehren gelangen?"
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das nur einmal fragen: Wie konnte Abschaum von den unteren Decks an eine Kiste mit Maschinengewehren gelangen?"

languages.text: « Je ne poserai la question qu'une fois. Comment des vermines des ponts inférieurs ont pu mettre la main sur une cargaison de fusils d'assaut ? »
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne poserai la question qu'une fois. Comment des vermines des ponts inférieurs ont pu mettre la main sur une cargaison de mitrailleuses ? »

languages.text: "Bunu yalnızca bir kez soracağım. Alt güvertelerdeki o alçakların eline bir ototüfek kasası nasıl geçti?"
languages.original_text: "I am only going to ask this once. How did wretches from the lower decks get their hands on a crate of autoguns?"
